about_the_game:
This DLC includes:

  • Full game soundtrack in MP3
  • Wallpapers of all the characters

The OST track list is:
[00] - Lost In This Night.mp3
[01] - Triumphant.mp3
[02] - The Legend Lives.mp3
[03] - Desert town.mp3
[04] - The Unknown Soldier.mp3
[05] - The Amazons are coming.mp3
[06] - Black wedding.mp3
[07] - Triumph Over Evil.mp3
[08] - Pure Love.mp3
[09] - Shadows of a forgotten past.mp3
[10] - Glory over death.mp3
[11] - Chzulu prayer.mp3
[12] - Death lords.mp3
[13] - Joyful.mp3
[14] - Shape your destiny.mp3
[15] - Underwood.mp3
[16] - No one.mp3
[17] - The Warchief.mp3
[18] - Beer dance.mp3
[19] - Alter ego.mp3
[20] - The moments with you.mp3
[21] - Lost In This Night Short Version.mp3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4 and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Cursed Lands MP3+Wallpapers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: This DLC contains the game original soundtrack in MP3 + Wallpapers with the game characters.
